credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Stage Design: Palace Courtyard
provenance: From the Collection of Giovanni Piancastelli; Mr. and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over black chalk on thick paper with uneven upper edge, lined with cream or light brown paper
description: Design for a stage set.  The entrance into a vast palace in antique style.  Massive arcaded walls meet each other at the right angle.  A part of the vaulted coffered ceiling of one of the spaces visible at the top.
name: Drawing
